user.biography:
🌍 Where feminism and environmentalism come together.
🌿 Check out our hemp underwear brand @magithelabel!
👩‍💻 Created by @nergizdebaere

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 22, 2021 tagging @magithelabel. May be an illustration of text.

node.text: Are we surprised that racism directly contributed to climate change? Slides by @magithelabel - our hemp underwear brand where we’re seeking to make hemp mainstream again and restore justice to communities affected by these laws ✊

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 22, 2021 tagging @magithelabel. May be an illustration of text.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 22, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'A brief history of nemp HEMP HAS BEEN AN EXTREMELY IMPORTANT RESOURCE FOR HUMANS TO CREATE FUEL, FOOD, FABRIC AND MEDICINE AND ITS USE DATES BACK 4000 YEARS IT WAS THE MOST CULTIVATED CROP IN HUMAN HISTORY, NOTED FOR ITS INCREDIBLE STRENGTH AND EASE TO GROW magi'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 22, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Hemp and racism US POLITICIANS AND THE MEDIA TRIED TO DEMONISE HEMP, CHANGING ITS NAME TO "MARIJUANA" TO CREATE A NARRATIVE OF DANGER, AND ASSOCIATING IT WITH MEXICAN AND BLACK PEOPLE IN ORDER TO STOKE ΧΕΝΟΡΗΟΒΙΑ IN WHITE AMERICANS AFTER THE "MARIHUANA TAX ACT" OF 1937, BLACK PEOPLE WERE THREE TIMES MORE LIKELY TO BE ARRESTED FOR VIOLATING DRUG LAWS THAN WHITE PEOPLE. AND MEXICANS WERE NEARLY NINE TIMES MORE LIKELY. magi Business Insider, "How acism contributed to marijuana prohibition in the US"'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 22, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'CANNABIS USE WAS ASSOCIATED WITH THE POOR, WITH INDIGENOUS PEOPLE, WITH MEXICAN PEOPLE, BLACK PEOPLE AND OTHER MINORITY GROUPS. so OUTLAWING HEMP WAS A WAY TO WIELD CONTROL OVER THESE PEOPLE. SIN VICIOUS RACKET ARMS WITH IT'S AROUND YOUR CHILDREN DEBAUCHERY GRADATION INSANITY BOUT TRUTH THE SMOKE OF HELL DEVIL'S HARVEST magi'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 22, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'If nemp hadn't been made illegal, climate change might have been avérted. IF WE HAD USED HEMP INSTEAD OF TREES FOR PAPER, THERE WOULD BE MUCH. MUCH LESS DEFORESTATION BECAUSE ONE ACRE OF HEMP PRODUCES AS MUCH PAPER AS 4-10 ACRES OF TREES HEMP IS REALLY STRONG AND MAKES GREAT BIOPLASTICS, so WE COULD HAVE AVOIDED THE PLASTIC POLLUTION PROBLEM WE HAVE NOW magi'.
Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021 tagging @earthrise.studio. May be an image of sky and text that says 'earthrise 'No One Is Safe' Extreme Weather Batters the the Wealthy World'.

node.text:
It shouldn’t have to happen to you for it to matter to you. The poorest and most oppressed in wealthy societies will suffer the most, but let’s not forget that poorer countries have already been experiencing massive effects of climate change, without the luxury of big budgets to clean up the mess. Sadly all the power to fix this is in the hands of the govts of the Global North. 

Slides via our friends at @earthrise.studio ⭐️

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021 tagging @earthrise.studio. May be an image of sky and text that says 'earthrise 'No One Is Safe' Extreme Weather Batters the the Wealthy World'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021. May be a Twitter screenshot of text that says 'earthrise Greta Thunberg @GretaThunberg Deadly heatwaves floods, storms, wildfires, droughts, crop failures... This is not "the new normal". We're at the very beginning of a climate and ecological emergency, and extreme weather events will only become more and more frequent. #FaceTheClimateEmergency 10:15 AM Jul 15, 2021 Twitter for iPhone So.NwY21) One S New York Times. (2021). 'NoOS' 2/7'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021. May be an image of outdoors and text that says 'earthrise This week extreme weather events across the Global North have dominated the media. Droughts Source:New York Times. (2021) NoOne Is Safe''.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021. May be an image of outdoors and text.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021. May be an image of fire and text.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'earthrise While these headlines are an important reminder that even the world's richest nations remain unprepared for the intensifying consequences of climate change, news coverage disregards the impact the climate crisis has been having for decades on the most vulnerable and marginalised in our society. Soure.NewYokTmes.2021).NoOelsSae 6/7'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 20, 2021. May be an image of text.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 17, 2021. May be a Twitter screenshot of 1 person and text that says 'Robert Reich @RBReich Billionaires rocketing off into space while the rest of humanity suffers isa is sign of a broken society, not societal progress. CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

node.text: While everyday people suffer from the effects of climate change (most recently terrible floods in Europe) as a result of the actions of the ultra rich, those same ultra rich are having a space race amongst themselves. These people are richer than whole COUNTRIES. This cannot go on.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 17, 2021. May be a Twitter screenshot of 1 person and text that says 'Robert Reich @RBReich Billionaires rocketing off into space while the rest of humanity suffers isa is sign of a broken society, not societal progress. CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 17, 2021 tagging @danpriceseattle. May be a Twitter screenshot of 1 person and text that says 'Dan Price @DanPriceSeattle Just so we're clear: Richard Branson (worth $5.3 billion) got $220 million from taxpayers in New Mexico (one of the poorest states) to start a space travel business that 0.02% of the population can afford tickets for. CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 17, 2021 tagging @mary.l.trump. May be a Twitter screenshot of text that says 'Mary L Trump @MaryLTrump How's this headline: Branson, Musk, and Bezos who could tackle child hunger, climate change, racial njustice, health care, the rise of fascism etc and still be richer than 99.9999% of us choose to be narcissistic assholes and shoot their money into space. That about right? CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 15, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.text: Toothpaste doesn’t have to be in a tube, the same way water doesn’t have to come from a plastic bottle. That’s why @unpaste_tablets has created toothpaste tabs that you chew, no tube required! Perfect for plastic-free July 🦷

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 15, 2021. May be an image of text.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 15, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'If we put these toothpaste tubes end to end, they would circle the globe three times. TOOTHPASTE TUBES ARE OFTEN UNRECYCLABLE, AS THEY HAVE A METAL INNER CASING. BUT THERE ARE SOLUTIONS τO THE TOOTHPASTE PLASTIC WASTE CRISIS... CHICKS CLIMATE'.

Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 15, 2021 tagging @unpaste_tablets. May be an image of text that says 'Toothpaste tablets are 100% zero waste and just as good at cleaning your teeth! 100% NATURAL TRY UNPASTE'S TOOTH TABS, WRAPPED IN A COMPOSTABLE PACKET WITH 125 TABS UNPASTE TOOTHTABS @zrowasplentoyourtothpaste FLUORIDE "." Chew. Brush. Smile!'.
Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 14, 2021 tagging @unclimatechange. May be an image of text that says 'C United Nations Climate ange The different futures that lie ahead. +1.5°C +2°C +3°C'.

node.text:
Just one degree makes a huge difference. That’s why we need to encourage our leaders to keep warming to below 1.5 C per the Paris Agreement. We can still do it. ⭐️

Data from @carbonbrief ☁️

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 14, 2021 tagging @unclimatechange. May be an image of text that says 'C United Nations Climate ange The different futures that lie ahead. +1.5°C +2°C +3°C'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 14, 2021. May be an image of sky and text that says '3% probability of an ice-free Arctic summer in any one year. 16% probability of an ice-free Arctic summer in any one year. 63% probability of an ice-free Arctic summer in any one year. +1.5°C +2°C +3°C'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 14, 2021. May be an image of outdoors and text that says '2 months average length of drought 4 months average length of drought 10 months average length ofdrought +1.5°C +2°C +3°C'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 14, 2021. May be an image of elephant, outdoors and text that says '4% of mammals losing half their habitat 8% of mammals losing half their habitat 41% of mammals losing half their habitat +1.5°C +2°C +4.5°C'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 14, 2021. May be an image of sky and text that says '+62% +97% +41% increase in area burned by wildfires in average Mediterranean summer. increase in area burned by wildfires in average Mediterranean summer. increase in area burned by wildfires in average Mediterranean summer. +1.5°C +2°C +3°C'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 12, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'WHEN FOOTBALL TEAMS LOSE, DOMESTIC VIOLENCE INCREASES BY 36% CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

node.text:
The fragility of white masculinity is on full display in the wake of England’s loss. Just look at the horrific racial abuse aimed at players like Rashford and Saka. No one should have to fear for their lives or safety as a result of a football game. Disappointed, but not surprised.

Source: The Economist, “Domestic violence surges after a football match ends”

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 12, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'WHEN FOOTBALL TEAMS LOSE, DOMESTIC VIOLENCE INCREASES BY 36% CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 12, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'UK DOMESTIC VIOLENCE SUPPORT HELPLINE: 0808 2000247 2000 CHI CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 11, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says '"12 leaders in feminist action for climate justice" FROM APOLITICAL'S 100 MOST INFLUENTIAL PEOPLE IN GENDER POLICY 2021'.

node.text: Take a look at this incredible list of people working towards feminist action for climate justice. They’re leading the way and doing the work every day, let’s support them! 🙌✨

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 11, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says '"12 leaders in feminist action for climate justice" FROM APOLITICAL'S 100 MOST INFLUENTIAL PEOPLE IN GENDER POLICY 2021'.

Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 11, 2021 tagging @unatalie, @bridiekatie, @hindououmar, @stellafunsani, @cfigueres, @aletabaun479, @najataounsaliba, and @drkwilkinson. May be an image of 10 people and text that says 'Aleta Baun Environmental Activist Angie Daze Team Institutef Sustainable Development (IISD) Bridget Burns Director, r,Women's Environment Development Organization (WEDO) Christiana Figueres Co-founder, Globa Optimism Clare Church Researcherand Environmental Advocate Dr. Fatima Denton Director, United University (UNU) Institute for Natural Resources Africa Hindou Ibrahim Founder, Indigenous Woe ofChad (AFPAT) Peoples Dr. Katharine Wilkinson Climate Change Strategist Teacher Prof. Najat Aoun Saliba Natalie Unterstell Chisry University Environmental Activist dExecutive Khaddit Beirut Stella Funsani Gama Forestry Advisor, Ministry Forestry Natural Resources, Malawi Tracy Kajumba Principal Researcher Team Leader, IIED Climate Change'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 09, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'THE AVERAGE REPRESENTATION OF WOMEN IN CLIMATE NEGOTIATING BODIES IS LESS THAN 30%. CHICKS CHICKS C CLIMATE'.

node.text: Why aren’t women and BIPOC communities represented in the spaces that matter? In the spaces that make change? @cop26uk please take notes. This is likely our last chance to make real change, let’s have the voices heard of those who will be affected the most.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 09, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'THE AVERAGE REPRESENTATION OF WOMEN IN CLIMATE NEGOTIATING BODIES IS LESS THAN 30%. CHICKS CHICKS C CLIMATE'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 09, 2021. May be an image of text that says '70% OF 1.3 BILLION PEOPLE LIVING IN POVERTY WORLDWIDE ARE WOMEN. WOMEN REPRESENT 50%-80% OF THE WORLD'S FOOD PRODUCTION LABOUR FORCE BUT OWN LESS THAN 10% OF THE LAND. WOMEN, ESPECIALLY IN THE GLOBAL SOUTH, ARE MUCH MORE VULNERABLE TO THE CLIMATE CRISIS. SO WHY ARE THEY NOT BEING REPRESENTED AT COP26? Source: Greenhouse PR, Why aren't there more women at COP26? CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 07, 2021 tagging @graphicsandgrain. May be an image of text that says 'THE OCEAN... INEXTRICABLY CONNECTED TO SI PEOPLE THE OCEAN LEFT MUCHLEFTTOBE To BE HAS so OCEAN MUCH EXPLORED TH1 CONTROLS THE WEATHER SHAPES THE FEATURES CLIMATE OCEAN CEAN EARTH THE THE THE OCEAN IS THE ONLY ONE WE HAVE THE OCEAN MAKES MAKESLIFE ON EARTH POSSIBLE IS HOME TO THE CEAN THE 10 CAAA NO 分 @GRAPHICSANDGRAIN'.

node.text: The ocean needs us and we need the ocean. We need it way more though so let’s protect it. 💙 @graphicsandgrain

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 05, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'IF FOOD WASTE WERE A COUNTRY, IT WOULD BE THE thírd híghest emítter OF CARBON EMISSIONS CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

node.text: There are both structural and individual issues at play here: as a society (in Europe, US, Canada, AUS) we don’t cherish and value food like we should. It’s a resource that we take for granted. Let’s not 🧡

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 05, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'IF FOOD WASTE WERE A COUNTRY, IT WOULD BE THE thírd híghest emítter OF CARBON EMISSIONS CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 05, 2021. May be an image of text that says '40% IS WASTED BEFORE IT MAKES IT TO YOUR HOME. HIGH AND MIDDLE INCOME COUNTRIES ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR MORE HOUSEHOLD FOOD WASTE THAN LOW INCOME COUNTRIES. IF WE STOPPED WASTING FOOD, WE COULD ELIMINATE 8% OF GLOBAL EMISSIONS CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 04, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'How bad are fireworks for the environment? CHICKS FOR EOR CLIMATE'.

node.text: Fireworks are prob the most unnecessary form of pollution 🎆

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 04, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'How bad are fireworks for the environment? CHICKS FOR EOR CLIMATE'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 04, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'They release particulates WHEN FIREWORKS EXPLODE, THEY RELEASE PARTICULATE MATTER 4X SMALLER THAN A GRAIN OF POLLEN. THESE PARTICULATES CAN MAKE IT HARD TO BREATHE AND CAN CAUSE ACID DEPOSITS, AFFECTING CITY WATER QUALITY AND WILDLIFE. A NOAA STUDY FOUND THAT PARTICULATES IN THE AIR INCREASE BY 370% AROUND JULY 4 IN THE US. CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 04, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'They release smoke OVERALL, THE GUNPOWDER USED IN THE ROUGHLY 240 MILLION POUNDS OF FIREWORKS BOUGHT FOR INDEPENDENCE DAY RELEASES ABOUT 50,000 METRIC TONS OF CARBON DIOXIDE. THIS IS EQUIVALENT TO THE SMOKE RELEASED IN A 2,700 ACRE WILDFIRE. Inverse, "July 4 fireworks create as much pollution as 2,700 acre wildfire" CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 04, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Let's forgo the fireworks! INSTEAD OF BUYING AND SETTING OFF YOUR OWN FIREWORKS, CONSIDER JUST WATCHING YOUR LOCAL FIREWORKS DISPLAY! OR CONSIDER ATTENDING A PARADE INSTEAD OR CELEBRATING ANOTHER WAY AND FORGOING THE FIREWORKS ALTOGETHER. CHICKS CLIMATE FOR'.
Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Plastic pollution is more than just an ocean problem. Here's why (+ a possible solution). CHICKS CLIMATE'.

node.text:
The plastic waste crisis won’t go away until legislation forces it to. In the meantime, we can reduce, reuse and REFILL 🥳 

Check out @blueland for their refillable forever bottles (which I’m absolutely loving, they look so cute) oh and P.S. they ship to the UK now! 🤩

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Plastic pollution is more than just an ocean problem. Here's why (+ a possible solution). CHICKS CLIMATE'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'CHICKS CLIMATE Of the 300 million tons of plastic produced each year, about 3% ends up in the ocean. But what happens to the other 97%? Marine plastics, IUCN'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'CHICKS CLIMATE Plastic is equally harmful above water as it is below. Microplastics have been detected in sewage sludge which is used as soil fertilizer. Plastic in incorrectly managed andfills can contaminate groundwater, and some punncs which can pollute the air. destined for recycling are instead We're not sure yet about the effects of plastic on human health, but we do know that it is everywhere. We eat it, we drink it and we even breathe it. Air Quality News, Burning plastic waste is causing air pollution in developing countries'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Some fast facts: CHICKS FORTE CLIMATE 40% of the plastic we use is single-use they're used once and persist in the environment for hundreds of years. By 2050, plastic production is expected to TRIPLE 9% of plastic in the US is recycled, half of which gets sent to other countries to deal with. World Economic Forum, Rethinking the future of plastics'.

Photo by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'CHICKS FORTE CLIMATE The only solution to stop plastic waste is to reduce our consumption of it. Plastic is convenient. But refillable products are entering the mainstream as an equally convenient solution that doesn't cost the Earth.'.
Photo shared by Chicks For Climate on July 02, 2021 tagging @blueland. May be an image of fragrance, cosmetics, bottle and text.
